desc: Nature's Embrace handcrafts premium natural organic latex mattresses in our own Canadian factory. Our family and owned operated business is located in the Vancouver suburb of Delta allowing us to deliver the best mattresses at amazing value. Buy direct from our factory and save.

layout.text: HEALTHIER MATTRESSES FOR A HEALTHIER SLEEP

CAREFULLY CRAFTED BY EXPERT MATTRESS-MAKERS, EACH NATURE’S EMBRACE ORGANIC LATEX MATTRESS IS ENGINEERED FROM THE PUREST DUNLOP LATEX TO CREATE A SUPREMELY COMFORTABLE AND SUPPORTIVE SLEEPING SURFACE — WITH ALL THE HEALTH BENEFITS OF NATURAL AND ORGANIC MATERIALS.
